EmailTemplate.description: Template to provide details to the class leader of their upcoming class
EmailTemplate.name: Leader - upcoming class details
EmailTemplate.subject: Your upcoming Code Club Class: {!Class__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Class__c.Session_Leader_Name__c},
You are scheduled to be the leader of the upcoming Code Club class: Date & Time: {!Class__c.Class_Date__c} Location: Piha Meeting Room, L26, PwC Tower
Registration numbers for this class are: Students: {!Class__c.Student_Count__c} Staff: {!Class__c.Staff_Count__c} including you
For a full class list, click here: Classic: https://codeclub-nz.my.salesforce.com/00O7F000001hzoN?&pv0={!Class__c.Id} Lightning: https://codeclub-nz.lightning.force.com/one/one.app#/sObject/00O7F000001hzoNUAQ/view?=undefined&fv0={!Class__c.Id}
(Just in case you can't remember your username in this org, it is {!Class__c.Session_Leader_SF_Username__c}).
Please confirm with any other staff members listed on this linked report that they are ready to help you.
The Topic for this class is {!Class__c.Project_Topic__c} and the content can be found here: {!Class__c.Content_URL__c}.
Have fun and keep the students keen :-)
On the completion of the class - please remember to update the attendance status of all the students by updating this Class record's related list https://codeclub-nz.my.salesforce.com/{!Class__c.Id},
...and update the roster for next week's class
There's a video here that shows you how to do these things: https://codeclub-nz.lightning.force.com/one/one.app#/sObject/ContentDocument/0697F000000cPdPQAU
...and don't forget to log your time in the Salesforce.org system. Here's a direct link to the activity record where you can log your time once you have signed in via Aloha https://foundation.my.salesforce.com/apex/Volunteerforce1?sfdc.tabName=01r80000000Gzb4#/log-hours?log-step=3.
If you haven't already got a Scratch account, then sign up here: https://scratch.mit.edu/ . It's a bit like Trailhead - you need to log into your scratch account before you can save any work you do
Best wishes, Code Club Aotearoa
